readable.title: 2868575889_2c030aa8ae
readable.content: A man in an orange shirt flips his skateboard on a suburban street . A man in a red shirt is performing an aerial trick with a skateboard on a sidewalk . A skateboarder in the air above his board on a residential street . A young man jumps up off his skateboard on the street in front of a house . The guy is wearing a red shirt and doing a aerial flip with his skateboard .
